content: Hi all, where can I find the recording of the Connectathon Participant Information Session? Would like to link the latest in my presentation
@Vadim Peretokin , which session are you looking for? Is it one of the kickoffs or one of the trainings?
Hmm the Participant Information Session that was held on 8/31/21
Can you doublecheck that date? It hasn't occurred yet
That would explain it :) thanks for pointing that out
